content: these easy mitts work up quickly making them a great stash buster and a great gift pattern one size fits most i made another pair for my husband s large hands by going up one hook size and using aran weight yarn instead of light worsted pattern was designed using hand dyed worsted yarn which tends to be lighter than many commercial worsted yarns my testers used lion brand wool ease lion brand touch of alpaca loops and threads impeccable yarn bee soft and sleek and other similar yarns knowledge of basic stitches working in the round and gauge measurement are recommended
